text: "Dancing Machine" is a 1973 hit song by The Jackson 5. The song reached #2 on the U.S. Billboard Hot 100. It also hit #1 on the American R&B; charts. The Jackson 5 got their second Grammy Award nomination for this song. The song was released on February 19, 1974. It sold more than three million copies. ==References== Category:Pop songs Category:1974 songs Category:The Jackson 5 songs Category:MC Hammer songs Category:Paula Abdul songs
title: Dancing Machine
